product_name: Northwave Evolution S.B.S. Road Bike Shoes - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Built for speed, the sleek Northwave Evolution S.B.S road cycling shoes offer super lightweight soles and welded uppers to eliminate wasted energy and make sure you get the most out of every stroke. 3-layer full carbon soles provide a super lightweight, stiff platform that ensures maximum power transfer; air vents in the soles improve ventilation and reduce overheating. WLI (Wood Lasting Insole) uses bonded layers of wood to provide arch support and reduce vibrations. Thermowelded uppers reduce weight by eliminating stitching and excess fabric; EVA footbeds provide cushioning and arch support. Step By Step (S.B.S) ratcheting buckles and 2 rip-and-stick straps let you dial in a precise fit by incrementally releasing or adding pressure on the buckle closure. Omega heel cups cradle your heels for a snug, secure fit that won't budge. Northwave Evolution S.B.S road cycling shoes are compatible with SPD-SL, Time, Look and Speedplay cleats. Cleats not included. Closeout.
short_description: Built for speed, the sleek Northwave Evolution S.B.S road cycling shoes offer super lightweight soles and welded uppers to eliminate wasted energy and make sure you get the most out of every stroke.
